Name: Drive-By Hero
About the game: After the discovery of a new resource which have boosted the U.S economy. Scientists began to discover some...undesirable effects. Six months later, the country is devastated: Factories have stopped working, economy collapses and people are now affected by a strange disease which has transformed them into zombies. Inspired by arcade game experiences, Drive By Hero is an apocalyptic shooter game. Shoot enemies, kill bosses, use new weapons and try to survive in this horrific action game. Alone with your car and your gun, you are not the hero they deserve but the one they need.
